recipesJson.name: Ginger Zinger
recipesJson.author: CheebaSteeba
recipesJson.description: My take on a Ginger Ale with Rum -- The TFA Ginger Ale tastes like the syrup of what would be a mix between Vernor's and store brand Ginger Ale, and the TFA Champagne does a good job of watering down the syrup a bit and providing an essence of effervescence

reviews.text: This tastes very close to a dark and stormy. Goslings black rum and ginger beer. Very good recipe!
